remediation: A fix was pushed into the master branch but not yet published.
title: Cross-site Scripting

vulnDescription.Overview: mediawiki/core is a Free software wiki application developed by the Wikimedia Foundation and others. Note: This package is not maintained on Packagist anymore, but newer releases exist. Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting due to improper escaping of user-supplied input on the Special:log/rights page and includes/logging/RightsLogFormatter.php file. An attacker to execute malicious scripts within the affected page, posing a risk of unauthorized code execution or other malicious activities.
